name: Gropus
description:
Lowrez jam 2016 entry: Gropus!

You are Gropus, an octopus stuck deep inside an animal testing lab, and you must rescue your fellow octopi and avoid the animal wranglers and scientists intent on capturing you! All in 64x64 pixels.

  • Each level is procedurally generated and completely random
  • Levels increase in size each time you rescue an octopi
  • New features coming soon!

Designed and developed by Hexagoncircle and Mojiferous

Controls:

Arrows to move

WASD to shoot ink

Space bar to drop ink
